const groupedSales=sales.reduce((acc,sale)=>{const date=sale.date;acc[date]=acc[date]||[];acc[date].push(sale);return acc;},{});const sortedDates=Object.keys(groupedSales).sort((a,b)=>new Date(b)-new Date(a));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{sx:{width:'100%',mt:4},children:sortedDates.map(date=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:2,sx:{my:2,p:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"primary",sx:{mb:2},children:["Sales on ",date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{sx:{mb:2}}),groupedSales[date].map(sale=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{secondaryAction:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>startEdit(sale),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>deleteSale(sale.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})]}),sx:{mb:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:"".concat(sale.itemName," - $").concat(sale.price),secondary:"Category: ".concat(sale.category," | Date: ").concat(sale.date," | Payment Mode: ").concat(sale.paymentMode)})},sale.id))]})},date))});}export default SaleList;
